header.description: Animations Pack by AvgZing using Oreville Studios' original works, with heavy trimming for use on the Oakridge: Survival Unhinged personal realm and for other personal use. Included mobs: cat, chicken, cow, donkey, fox, horse, mule, pig, sheep, wolf.
